Exceeds Expectations.quote: Pleasure in the job puts perfection in the work.
Exceeds Expectations.author: Aristotle

Exceeds Expectations.quote: The greatest achievement is to outperform yourself.
Exceeds Expectations.author: Denis Waitley

Exceeds Expectations.quote: Keep exceeding expectations don't let anybody tell you you can't or you're not.
Exceeds Expectations.author: Someone Wise

Exceeds Expectations.quote: Exceeding expectations is where satisfaction ends and loyalty begins.
Exceeds Expectations.author: Ron Kaufman

Exceeds Expectations.quote: There is no straighter road to success than exceeding expectations one day at a time.
Exceeds Expectations.author: Robin Crow

Exceeds Expectations.quote: Snowfall is expected to considerably exceed the normal range, both in frequency and quantity.
Exceeds Expectations.author: Mark Oliver

Exceeds Expectations.quote: The better you do, the more expectations you raise in the eyes of the people around!!
Exceeds Expectations.author: Senora Roy

Exceeds Expectations.quote: High achievement always takes the place in the framework of high expectation.
Exceeds Expectations.author: Charles Kettering

Exceeds Expectations.quote: Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you will land among the stars.
Exceeds Expectations.author: Vincent Peale

Exceeds Expectations.quote: Do more than you have to, be better than whats expected of you. Go beyond the goals you set.
Exceeds Expectations.author: Darren Hardy

Meets Expectations.quote: Do what you do so well that they will want to see it again and again and bring their friend.
Meets Expectations.author: Walt Disney

Meets Expectations.quote: Perfection is achieved, not when there is nothing more to add, but when there is nothing left to take away.
Meets Expectations.author: Antoine de Saint Exupery

Meets Expectations.quote: If you always do what you’ve always done, you’ll always get what you’ve always got.
Meets Expectations.author: Henry Ford

Meets Expectations.quote: Strive for continuous improvement, instead of perfection.
Meets Expectations.author: Kim Collins

Meets Expectations.quote: Meeting Expectations is good but exceeding expectation is great!!
Meets Expectations.author: Someone Wise

Meets Expectations.quote: Perfection is not attainable. But if we chase perfection, we can catch excellence.
Meets Expectations.author: Vince Lombardi

Meets Expectations.quote: Do the best you can until you know better. Then when you know better, do better.
Meets Expectations.author: Maya Angelou

Meets Expectations.quote: The only thing standing between you and outrageous success is continuous progress.
Meets Expectations.author: Dan Waldschmidt

Meets Expectations.quote: There are no traffic jams on the extra mile.
Meets Expectations.author: Zig Ziglar

Meets Expectations.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
Meets Expectations.author: Walt Disney

Needs Improvement.quote: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
Needs Improvement.author: Tim Ferriss

Needs Improvement.quote: Productivity is being able to do things that you were never able to do before.
Needs Improvement.author: Franz Kafka

Needs Improvement.quote: Sometimes, things may not go your way, but the effort should be there every single night.
Needs Improvement.author: Michael Jordan

Needs Improvement.quote: Action is the foundational key to all success. So work on it
Needs Improvement.author: Piccaso

Needs Improvement.quote: The key is not to prioritize what’s on your schedule, but to schedule your priorities.
Needs Improvement.author: Stephen Convey

Needs Improvement.quote: Oh yes, the past can hurt. But you can either run from it, or learn from it.
Needs Improvement.author: Rafiki

Needs Improvement.quote: When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too.
Needs Improvement.author: Paulo Coelho

Needs Improvement.quote: If something is wrong, fix it now. But train yourself not to worry, worry fixes nothing.
Needs Improvement.author: Ernest Hemingway

Needs Improvement.quote: Sometimes the fall kills you. And sometimes, when you fall, you fly.
Needs Improvement.author: Neil Gaiman

Needs Improvement.quote: The biggest room in the world is the room for improvement.
Needs Improvement.author: Helmut Schmidt
